technology is bigger than us the only
thing that you can do is come up with
the best ways to utilize it take the

social mission we want to make a
revolution in teaching mathematics
worldwide we want to teach them to fall
in love with mathematics and we do it in
the way of computer games we have a huge
portfolio of thousands of games so when
we come into a country we first of all
met all our games on the national
mathematics curriculum and the idea is
not to replace the teacher but rather to
empower the teacher EWS is a central
component in our backbone and it
provides what we need in terms of global
infrastructure we operate in about 40
different countries in more than 30
languages if you want to expand in a
scaled way you cannot do it without
technology you cannot to do it without
the cloud and in particular in
third-world countries in countries that
need most help we believe that with the
internet and with low-cost mobile
devices and smart phones you can bring
very high quality education to anyone
the reality is technology is the agent
of change my hope is that any child will
access to top quality education and I
think that we're very close with
